::: The doors slide open, and in marched Hell Beast, Megatron, Black Aracnia, 
Marine, and Jackle. They made there way through the base and into the bridge. 
Hell Beast was not in a good moode. :::

::: He took his command chair and floated to the main computer where 
Transanulas sat :::

::: Hell Beast ::: Well, what happened?!

::: Pheniox ::: We put up a good fight, and we forced the invaders to retreat.

::: Hell Beast ::: Excellent work! 

::: Gremlim ::: And what of the peace meeting?

::: Megatron ::: Liono wouldnt go through with it.

::: Hell Beast ::: That idiot...he will pay. But it seems that he is now 
attacking the Newcomers.....

::: Marine ::: Commander, I would gladly lead our soldiers into battle!

::: Hell Beast ::: Not just yet...we must decided with Zardus. We are a 
coalition now.
